Class User

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents an User in the system

    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String password,
            int role)
        Creates a User with the given attributes Encrypt user's password with SHA256 encryption and store the hashed value
        Parameters:
        email - This User's username (email)
        password - This User's password (unencrypted)
        role - This User's role (used to determine if Admin or Movie_Goer)

    • Method Detail

      • validatePassword

        public boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String passwordToCompare)
        Validate if a password input is correct Done by hashing the input and comparing with the stored hashed value
        Parameters:
        passwordToCompare - Password input to be compared with
        Returns:
        boolean Return true if password is input is correct, else false

      • getEmail

        public java.lang.String getEmail()
        Get the email of this User
        Returns:
        String this user's email

      • getPasswordHashed

        public java.lang.String getPasswordHashed()
        Get the hashed password of this User
        Returns:
        String this user's hashed password

      • getRole

        public int getRole()
        Get the role of this User
        Returns:
        int this User's role

      • updatePassword

        public void updatePassword(java.lang.String currentPassword,
                           java.lang.String newPassword)
        Change the password of this User Validate that person changing it knows the current password Done by hashing the input and comparing with the stored hashed value
        Parameters:
        currentPassword - Password input to be compared with
        newPassword - This User's new password

      • PasswordSHA256

        public java.lang.String PasswordSHA256(java.lang.String passwordToHash,
                                       java.lang.String salt)
        Used to encrypt User's password Improved security by using Salt (User's)
        Parameters:
        passwordToHash - Password to be encrypted
        salt - Salt to be used (will be User's email)
        Returns:
        String
